release.description: Made RPM and tarballs Maven attached artifacts, formalized RPM version/release numbers, major emphasis on itegration testing the full lifecycle and making implementation footprint smaller
release.action: Issue logged to move, file. Functionality covered in ant-maven-plugin or shell-maven-plugin.
Update code to maven 2.1.0
Fix bulk of eclipse and checkstyle code problems, and there are lots.
If you have a dependency on cbuild-utils, you have to include a dependency on plexus-utils or you get class mismatch exceptions.
Tests in tests directory don't run. Ended up with total rewrite using maven-invoker-plugin in integration-tests directory.
Rewrite code to make tarballs and RPMs maven attached artifact. Eliminate custom deploy goals favoring maven-deploy-plugin.
Subtask of CBUILDS-35
Depricate release property forcing POM version to RPM compatible version.
Update mojo-parent, settled on version 21.
Fix documentation links to svn/fisheye
Create integration test suite with maven-invoker-plugin.

Issue started as refactoring, which was done, but what ended up happening is CBUILD specific artifact handlers were replaced with the standard maven plugins wagon-maven-plugin, build-helper-maven-plugin, maven-dependency-plugin, and maven-deploy-plugin
Remove platform-detective-maven-plugin moving function into validate goal of rpm-cbuild-maven-plugin.
Remove BuildAdvisor session cookie mechanism.
Fix pathOf expansion in shell-maven-plugin seen with Maven 2.0.9.

release.description: Downgrade to Maven 2.0.9, upgrade to JDK 1.5, mojo-parent site standarization, feature additions, bugfixes
release.action: Implement BuildContext facility in Maven 2.1. This was an idea which was backed out of Maven then in CBUIDLS itself (CBUILDS-22).
Replace Antcalls with plexus Commandline utility calls. Simplifies dependencies and fixes alot of buggy ant tasks

Simplify configurations using new profile extensions in maven 2.1. While implemented, this is not released in 1.0-alpha-5 as this release was backported when the profile extensions release was delayed to Maven 3.0 (CBUILDS-28).
Have the patch plugin bow out gracefully if there is nothing to do.
Source patches are always unpacked even if source archive has been expanded.
Incorporate implicit version ranges for handline version numbers where 1.2.0 -> [1.2.0,1.2.1)
make:configure step should suport forcing relative-path reference to ./configure
Add parameter aliases to make:configure that are more intuitive (skipConfigure in addition to skipConfig)
Maven dependencies need to match RPM dependencies
Incorporate release number into maven version.
Add support for defining an environment variable for a mojo execution.
Need support for code generation tools
SCM based C builds lifecycle
Create unit and integration tests for make-maven-plugin
Create unit and integration tests for rpm-cbuild-maven-plugin
Create unit and integration tests for cbuilds-utils
Binary project artifact must include system specific OS/Architecture tokens as a classifier
Build failure when installing RPM
rpm plugin fails from incompatible /etc/*releases file with Redhat AS5 and Centos OS4
Deal with BuildContext being deprecated in Maven 2.1 (aka Maven 3.0)
Pass DESTDIR to make install correctly as documented with autotools
maven clean does not delete symbolic links
Deal with maven 2.1-SNAPSHOTs being deleted out of internet repos
Downport code from Maven 3.x to Maven 2.x
